name: DefuseBom
description:
DEFUSE BOM

In this game, you are required to turn off a BOMB that is active. Time, speed, patience, and accuracy are the keys to success.

Pada game ini kalian diharuskan mematikan sebuh BOM yang sedang aktif,. Waktu, kecepatan , kesabaran, dan ketelitian adalah kunci keberhasilan.

Game by GoHome
